subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Matt Harvey made his All-Star debut to a hometown crowd, but it was Mariano Rivera of the Yankees, playing in his 13th and final All-Star Game, who sealed the win for the American League.
snippet: The Mets’ Matt Harvey made his All-Star debut to a hometown crowd, but it was Mariano Rivera of the Yankees, playing in his 13th and final All-Star Game, who sealed the win for the American League.
